input.sentences: the friends were at a party .
they had a lot of drinks .
they took a lot of photos | some embarrassing .
then have more drinks to drink .
output.sentences: These two are the bestest of friends, excited about their night out on the town.
One had a great thought to go get something to use to document the night's events.
She quickly returned with a camera.
They quickly went to work getting pictures.
They even made a new friend to create new memories with.
